favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.no-items: You haven't added your favorite cities yet, but it's easy to do. Choose any city from the list on Home page and follow the weather ;)

favorites-limit.title: Favorites limited
favorites-limit.text: Sorry, but you can't add more than 5 cards to your favorites, you can delete one of the existing ones and then add this one
